title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & more inside a lightweight Go server with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, model management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and minimal dependencies.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, list models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart for deploying Ollama with optional GPU & persistence.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Full-stack ChatGPT-style clone with Ollama backend support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to query local Ollama models from notes.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin integrating Ollama for AI-assisted note taking.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that forwards messages to Ollama and streams replies.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot slash-command integration for Ollama with conversation memory.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama using Finch HTTP client and streaming.
